开放数据沙龙

Apr 08, 2014

#100 Transit Future and Large Lots

For our 100th Hack Night, we will have two presentations:

Ed Oser and Nick Doiron (https://twitter.com/mapmeld) will present Transit Future, a vision of an expanded Chicago public transportation system led by the Center for Neighborhood Technology and Active Transportation Alliance with a visualization by Open City.

AND

Demond Drummer from Teamwork Englewood will talk about LargeLots.org, an app built by DataMade and LISC Chicago for navigating the City's program for selling vacant lots on the South Side for $1.

Links

  • Transit Future Vision
  • Large Lots
  • Hack Night Live: Transit Future and LargeLots.org

6pm
Apr 08, 2014

Braintree office
222 W Merchandise Mart Plz 8th Floor
Chicago, IL

Food provided by DataMade
